Property Name
------------
optical parameters
electrochemical parameters

(Note: I'm assuming that "PzNDTTPD" is a material or substance and not a property name, as it is mentioned in the paragraph as the subject of the comparison. If "PzNDTTPD" is indeed a property name, then it should be included in the table as well.)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph again, I realize that there are no clear material properties mentioned in the text. The phrase "optical and electrochemical parameters" is a general category of properties, but it does not refer to any specific property. Therefore, there are no valid entities to present as a Markdown table.

In the revised list, I have removed "PzNDTTPD" because it does not clearly refer to a "Value of material property." Instead, it appears to be a type of material or substance. The remaining entities, "optical parameters" and "electrochemical parameters," are values of material properties.
